name: Voltorb
flavorText:
Usually found in
power plants.
Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL,
they have zapped
many people.

previous.name: Kingler
previous.flavorText:
The large pincer
has 10000 hp of
crushing power. However, its huge
size makes it
unwieldy to use.

next.name: Electrode
next.flavorText:
It stores electric
energy under very
high pressure. It often explodes
with little or no
provocation.
